acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Lent for copying by Dr. Garnett C. Ryland, Virginia Baptist Historical Society, Richmond, Va., 8 November 1934.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Organized in 1788 in Prince George County. Originally known as Davenport Church. In 1800, that church disbanded, and the black members formed Sandy Beach Church in Petersburg. In 1818, its name was changed to Gillfield. For more information see, A Short History of Gillfield Baptist Church of Petersburg, Virginia, by Luther Porter Jackson, 1937.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These minutes cover the period 4 February 1815 to 15 April 1827. Some sessions list those present. Names of those received for membership are also recorded. Membership lists appear on pages 5-26 and are detailed and well organized.
